title: Authors and Citation
text: Data-Intensive Social Science Center. Funder, copyright holder. Micah Iserman. Maintainer, author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Iserman M (2024). schoolCDS: School Common Data Set (CDS) Data. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/DISSC-yale/schoolCDS, https://DISSC-yale.github.io/schoolCDS/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {schoolCDS: School Common Data Set (CDS) Data},   author = {Micah Iserman},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/DISSC-yale/schoolCDS},   url = {https://DISSC-yale.github.io/schoolCDS/}, }

title: School Common Data Set (CDS) Data
text: R package collect, process, work school Common Data Set (CDS) data, defined Common Data Set Initiative.

title: School Common Data Set (CDS) Data
text: current version extract dataset available docs/cds_data.csv, version included package cds_data.

title: School Common Data Set (CDS) Data
text: Download R r-project.org, install package R console: load package:

title: Common Data Set Extracts — cds_data
text: Extracted portions school Common Data Set reports.

title: Common Data Set Extracts — cds_data
text: data.frame report row, fields column. columns contain metadata: school Name school. source URL original PDF file. md5 MD5 hash original PDF file. retieved Date downloaded. processed Date processed. year Year report. rest named first section item number (e.g., B1), combination levels part, column name, row name original table.

title: Common Data Set Extracts — cds_data
code: cds_data[1:10, c(   "school", "retrieved", "B1_men_full_new_undergrad", "B1_women_full_new_undergrad" )] #>                school                retrieved B1_men_full_new_undergrad #> 1  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:46:21 2024                       577 #> 2  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:06 2024                       607 #> 3  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:06 2024                       634 #> 4  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:06 2024                       523 #> 5  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:06 2024                       589 #> 6  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:06 2024                       559 #> 7  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:07 2024                       514 #> 8  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:07 2024                       519 #> 9  Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:07 2024                       504 #> 10 Belmont University Mon Oct 14 17:50:08 2024                       901 #>    B1_women_full_new_undergrad #> 1                         1085 #> 2                         1303 #> 3                         1193 #> 4                         1063 #> 5                         1086 #> 6                         1002 #> 7                         1051 #> 8                         1049 #> 9                          883 #> 10                          NA

title: Get CDS Links — cds_get_links
text: Scrape links individual CDS reports school websites.

title: Get CDS Links — cds_get_links
code: cds_get_links(school, out_dir, url = NULL, overwrite = FALSE)

title: Get CDS Links — cds_get_links
text: school Name school. out_dir Path output directory. url Link school's CDS page, containing links individual reports. overwrite Logical; TRUE, always try retrieve fresh links, rather using previous pull.

title: Get CDS Links — cds_get_links
text: list, also saved {out_dir}/record/{school}/links.json: school: Name school. url: Link school's CDS page. retrieved: Time links retrieved. links: vector extracted links.

title: Get CDS Links — cds_get_links
code: if (dir.exists("../../reports")) {   report_links <- cds_get_links(     "Yale University", "../../reports", "https://oir.yale.edu/common-data-set"   )   report_links } #> $school #> [1] "Yale University" #>  #> $url #> [1] "https://oir.yale.edu/common-data-set" #>  #> $retrieved #> [1] "Tue Oct 29 16:37:06 2024" #>  #> $links #>  [1] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf"     #>  [2] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf"   #>  [3] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/yale_cds_2021-2022_vf_06062022_0.pdf" #>  [4] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_2020-2021_yale_vf_030521.pdf"     #>  [5] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_2019-2020_yale_vf_030420.pdf"     #>  [6] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_yale_2018-2019.pdf"               #>  [7] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_2017-2018.pdf"                    #>  [8] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2016-2017.pdf"                     #>  [9] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2015_2016_0.pdf"                   #> [10] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2014_2015_0.pdf"                   #> [11] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2013_2014.pdf"                     #> [12] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2012_2013.pdf"                     #> [13] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2011_2012_3.pdf"                   #> [14] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2010_2011_1.pdf"                   #> [15] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2009_2010_1.pdf"                   #> [16] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds2008_2009_1.pdf"                   #>

title: Download CDS Reports — cds_get_reports
text: Download CDS PDF reports given school, using URLs retrieved cds_get_links.

title: Download CDS Reports — cds_get_reports
code: cds_get_reports(school, out_dir, extract = TRUE, check = TRUE,   overwrite = FALSE, verbose = TRUE)

title: Download CDS Reports — cds_get_reports
text: school Name school. out_dir Path output directory, contain output cds_get_links record/{school} sub-directory. extract Logical; FALSE, save text PDF file. check Logical; FALSE, check file Common Data Set report. overwrite Logical; TRUE, always try download reports. verbose Logical; FALSE, show status messages.

title: Download CDS Reports — cds_get_reports
text: list entry report, also saved {out_dir}/record/{school}/manifest.json: url: Link report. retrieved: Time report downloaded. md5: MD5 sum report.

title: Download CDS Reports — cds_get_reports
code: if (dir.exists("../../reports")) {   manifest <- cds_get_reports("Yale University", "../../reports")   manifest[1:2] } #> checking 16 files from Yale University... #>   - cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - yale_cds_2021-2022_vf_06062022_0.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - cds_2020-2021_yale_vf_030521.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - cds_2019-2020_yale_vf_030420.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - cds_yale_2018-2019.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds_2017-2018.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2016-2017.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2015_2016_0.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2014_2015_0.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2013_2014.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2012_2013.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2011_2012_3.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2010_2011_1.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2009_2010_1.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:35 2024 #>   - cds2008_2009_1.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:35 2024 #> $`cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf` #> $`cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf`$url #> [1] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf" #>  #> $`cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf`$retrieved #> [1] "Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024" #>  #> $`cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf`$md5 #> [1] "d5c8a7c3cddbe19fca77bf9cc738eff5" #>  #>  #> $`cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf` #> $`cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf`$url #> [1] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf" #>  #> $`cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf`$retrieved #> [1] "Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024" #>  #> $`cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf`$md5 #> [1] "5b77852508b6d9a2d3c62ae5882a117c" #>  #>

title: Process a CDS Report — cds_process_report
text: Extract data CDS PDF report.

title: Process a CDS Report — cds_process_report
text: school Name school, checked document. file Path PDF report. ocr Logical; TRUE, use Optical Character Recognition extract text file.

title: Process a CDS Report — cds_process_report
text: list containing locations items identified report values extracted report.

title: Process a CDS Report — cds_process_report
code: file <- "../../reports/text/Yale University/cds2008_2009_1.txt" if (file.exists(file)) {   values <- cds_process_report("Yale University", file)   values[1:10] } #> $locations #> $locations$A #> title: Download CDS Reports — download_reports
text: Download CDS PDF reports given school, using URLs retrieved get_report_links.

title: Download CDS Reports — download_reports
code: download_reports(school, out_dir, overwrite = FALSE, verbose = TRUE)

title: Download CDS Reports — download_reports
text: school Name school. out_dir Path output directory, contain output get_report_links. overwrite Logical; TRUE, always try download reports. verbose Logical; FALSE, show status messages.

title: Download CDS Reports — download_reports
text: list entry report, also saved {out_dir}/{school}/manifest.json: url: Link report. retrieved: Time report downloaded. md5: MD5 sum report.

title: Download CDS Reports — download_reports
code: if (dir.exists("../../data/source")) {   manifest <- download_reports("yale", "../../data/source")   manifest[1:2] } #> checking 16 files... #>   - cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - yale_cds_2021-2022_vf_06062022_0.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - cds_2020-2021_yale_vf_030521.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - cds_2019-2020_yale_vf_030420.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024 #>   - cds_yale_2018-2019.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds_2017-2018.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2016-2017.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2015_2016_0.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2014_2015_0.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2013_2014.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2012_2013.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2011_2012_3.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2010_2011_1.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:34 2024 #>   - cds2009_2010_1.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:35 2024 #>   - cds2008_2009_1.pdf retrieved Wed Aug 28 08:55:35 2024 #> $`cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf` #> $`cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf`$url #> [1] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf" #>  #> $`cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf`$retrieved #> [1] "Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024" #>  #> $`cds_yale_2023-24_vf_20240320.pdf`$md5 #> [1] "d5c8a7c3cddbe19fca77bf9cc738eff5" #>  #>  #> $`cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf` #> $`cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf`$url #> [1] "https://oir.yale.edu/sites/default/files/cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf" #>  #> $`cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf`$retrieved #> [1] "Wed Aug 28 08:55:33 2024" #>  #> $`cds_yale_2022-2023_vf_10062023.pdf`$md5 #> [1] "5b77852508b6d9a2d3c62ae5882a117c" #>  #>

title: Get CDS Links — get_report_links
text: Scrape links individual CDS reports school websites.

title: Get CDS Links — get_report_links
code: get_report_links(school, out_dir, url = NULL, overwrite = FALSE)

title: Get CDS Links — get_report_links
text: school Name school. out_dir Path output directory. url Link school's CDS page, containing links individual reports. overwrite Logical; TRUE, always try retrieve fresh links, rather using previous pull.

title: Get CDS Links — get_report_links
text: list, also saved {out_dir}/{school}/links.json: school: Name school. url: Link school's CDS page. retrieved: Time links retrieved. links: vector extracted links.

what: schoolCDS: School Common Data Set (CDS) Data — schoolCDS-package
title: schoolCDS: School Common Data Set (CDS) Data — schoolCDS-package
text: Collect, process, work school Common Data Set (CDS) data (https://commondataset.org).

title: schoolCDS: School Common Data Set (CDS) Data — schoolCDS-package
text: Maintainer: Micah Iserman micah.iserman@gmail.com contributors: Data-Intensive Social Science Center [funder, copyright holder]
